verses.verse: <S%G1510>Am<s%> I not <S%G1658>free<s%>? <S%G1510>Am<s%> I not an <S%G652>apostle<s%>? Have I not <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%>? Are you not my <S%G2041>work<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>?

<S%G1487>If<s%> to <S%G243>others<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not an <S%G652>apostle,<s%> at <S%G235>least<s%> <S%G1065><s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> to you; for you are the <S%G4973>seal<s%> of my <S%G651>apostleship<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
My <S%G627>defense<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G350>examine<s%> me is this: <S%G3778><s%>
Do we not <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1849>right<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%>?

Do we not <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1849>right<s%> to <S%G4013>take<s%> <S%G4013>along<s%> a <S%G79>believing<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> and the <S%G80>brothers<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G2786>Cephas<s%>?
<S%G2228>Or<s%> do <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> and I not <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1849>right<s%> to <S%G3361>refrain<s%> from <S%G2038>working<s%>?

<S%G5101>Who<s%> at <S%G4218>any<s%> <S%G4218>time<s%> <S%G4754>serves<s%> as a <S%G4754>soldier<s%> at his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3800>expense<s%>? <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G5452>plants<s%> a <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> and does not <S%G2068>eat<s%> the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of it? <S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G4165>tends<s%> a <S%G4167>flock<s%> and does not <S%G2068>use<s%> the <S%G1051>milk<s%> of the <S%G4167>flock<s%>?

I am not <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G444>human<s%> <S%G444>judgment,<s%> am I? <S%G2228>Or<s%> does not the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%>?

For it is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G3551>Law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> "You shall not <S%G2778>muzzle<s%> the <S%G1016>ox<s%> while he is <S%G248>threshing.<s%>" <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G3199>concerned<s%> about <S%G1016>oxen,<s%> is He?

<S%G2228>Or<s%> is He <S%G3004>speaking<s%> <S%G3843>altogether<s%> for our <S%G1223>sake<s%>? <S%G1063>Yes,<s%> for our <S%G1223>sake<s%> it was <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G722>plowman<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G722>plow<s%> in <S%G1680>hope,<s%> and the <S%G248>thresher<s%> [to thresh] in <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G3348>sharing<s%> [the crops.]

<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G4687>sowed<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4152>things<s%> in you, is it <S%G3173>too<s%> <S%G3173>much<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> we should <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G4559>material<s%> <S%G4559>things<s%> from you?

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G3348>share<s%> the <S%G1849>right<s%> over you, do we not <S%G3123>more<s%>? <S%G235>Nevertheless,<s%> we did not <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>right,<s%> but we <S%G4722>endure<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> that we may <S%G1325>cause<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1464>hindrance<s%> to the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

Do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2038>perform<s%> <S%G2413>sacred<s%> <S%G2413>services<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> the [food] of the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> [and] <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3918>attend<s%> <S%G3918>regularly<s%> to the <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G4829>have<s%> their <S%G4829>share<s%> with the <S%G2379>altar<s%>?

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1299>directed<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2605>proclaim<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> to <S%G2198>get<s%> their <S%G2198>living<s%> from the <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>

But I have <S%G5530>used<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%> And I am not <S%G1125>writing<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> that it may be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> in my <S%G1722>case;<s%> for it would be <S%G2570>better<s%> <S%G3123><s%> for me to <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> have <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G2758>make<s%> my <S%G2745>boast<s%> an <S%G2758>empty<s%> one.

For <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel,<s%> I have <S%G3756>nothing<s%> to <S%G2745>boast<s%> of, for I <S%G1945>am<s%> <S%G1945>under<s%> <S%G318>compulsion;<s%> for <S%G3759>woe<s%> is me <S%G1437>if<s%> I do not <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1635>voluntarily,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3408>reward;<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G210>against<s%> my <S%G210>will,<s%> I have a <S%G3622>stewardship<s%> <S%G4100>entrusted<s%> to me.

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> is my <S%G3408>reward<s%>? That, when I <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel,<s%> I may <S%G5087>offer<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G77>without<s%> <S%G77>charge,<s%> <S%G1519>so<s%> as not to <S%G2710>make<s%> <S%G2710>full<s%> <S%G2710>use<s%> of my <S%G1849>right<s%> in the <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>

For though I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%> from <S%G3956>all<s%> [men,] I have <S%G1402>made<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> a <S%G1402>slave<s%> to <S%G3956>all,<s%> that I might <S%G2770>win<s%> the <S%G4183>more.<s%>

And to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> I <S%G1096>became<s%> as a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> that I might <S%G2770>win<s%> <S%G2453>Jews;<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> as <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> though not <S%G1510>being<s%> <S%G846>myself<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> that I might <S%G2770>win<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>Law;<s%>

to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G459>without<s%> <S%G459>law,<s%> as <S%G459>without<s%> <S%G459>law,<s%> though not <S%G1510>being<s%> <S%G459>without<s%> the <S%G459>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> but <S%G1772>under<s%> the <S%G1772>law<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> that I might <S%G2770>win<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G459>without<s%> <S%G459>law.<s%>

To the <S%G772>weak<s%> I <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G772>weak,<s%> that I might <S%G2770>win<s%> the <S%G772>weak;<s%> I have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men,<s%> that I may by <S%G3843>all<s%> <S%G3843>means<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5100>some.<s%>
And I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> that I may <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G4791>fellow<s%> <S%G4791>partaker<s%> of it.

Do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G5143>run<s%> in a <S%G4712>race<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5143>run,<s%> but [only] <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> the <S%G1017>prize<s%>? <S%G5143>Run<s%> in <S%G3779>such<s%> a <S%G3779>way<s%> that you may <S%G2638>win.<s%>

And <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G75>competes<s%> in the <S%G75>games<s%> <S%G1467>exercises<s%> self-control in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things.<s%> They <S%G3767>then<s%> [do it] to <S%G2983>receive<s%> a <S%G5349>perishable<s%> <S%G4735>wreath,<s%> but we an <S%G862>imperishable.<s%>

<S%G5106>Therefore<s%> I <S%G5143>run<s%> in <S%G3779>such<s%> a <S%G3779>way,<s%> as not <S%G84>without<s%> <S%G84>aim;<s%> I <S%G4438>box<s%> in <S%G3779>such<s%> a <S%G3779>way,<s%> as not <S%G1194>beating<s%> the <S%G109>air;<s%>

but I <S%G5299>buffet<s%> my <S%G4983>body<s%> and <S%G1396>make<s%> it my <S%G1396>slave,<s%> <S%G3381>lest<s%> <S%G3381>possibly,<s%> after I have <S%G2784>preached<s%> to <S%G243>others,<s%> I <S%G846>myself<s%> should be <S%G96>disqualified.<s%>
